question:
The Lokpal and Lokayuktas Act of 2013 amended which of the following acts?
1. Central Vigilance Commission Act (2003)
2. Delhi Special Police Establishment Act (1946)
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Lokpal and Lokayuktas Act of the parliament of India of the year 2013 amended both the Central Vigilance Commission Act (2003) and the Delhi Special Police Establishment Act of 1946.v
